text: Fuck the System is the eighth studio album by Scottish hardcore punk band, The Exploited. Fuck the System was released in January 2003. On 14 October 2003, 500 fans started a riot in Montreal, Quebec after an Exploited concert was cancelled because the band was not allowed into Canada. The band was then banned in Mexico City after city officials heard about the riot. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:The Exploited albums Category:Punk albums
title: Fuck the System
